articles.title: iPhone users complain their batteries are draining in minutes after iOS update - Telegraph.co.uk
articles.description: Turning the affected iPhones off and then on again seems to temporarily resolve the problem
articles.content:
iPhone users have complained that a new software update has caused older smartphone models to drain their battery power within minutes.
Customers have written on social media sites and online forums… [+929 chars]

articles.content:
An Asda employee has gone viral for her kindhearted response to an elderly customer who collapsed in store.
